title: Thermal wonderland
creator_credit: Stanhope Andrews and New Zealand National Film Unit
brief_description: Aerial view of Rotorua and the volcanic formation of the surrounding country. Geysers, mud pools, terraces, hot springs, and the color of the rock formation in the thermal district. Glimpses of Whakarewarewa, Rotomahana, Wairakei, and the Waikato River with the Huka Falls.
creator_credit_for_label: Stanhope Andrews and New Zealand National Film Unit
